name: D&D - Dices and Dungeons
description:
"D&D - Dices and Dungeons" is a wave survival game where you use random dice with random effects as weapons or tools to kill enemies (win condition: survive 6 waves).

Controls:

  • Movement --> W, A, S, D
  • Mouse Left Click --> Shoot Die
  • Mouse Right Click --> Swap Dice

Developed by:

  • Leandro Rocha
  • João Soares
  • José Almeida
  • Paulo Macedo
